name: sui-dev-agents
description: Complete SUI blockchain development toolkit with skills, agents, commands, hooks, MCP server, and rules for Move smart contracts, frontend integration, testing, and deployment
longDescription: SUI Dev Agents provides a comprehensive toolkit for building production-ready SUI blockchain applications. Includes 22 user-invocable skills, 19 orchestration agents, 9 commands, 8 auto hooks, 5 rule files, and a built-in MCP server with 14 gRPC tools. Covers the complete development lifecycle: architecture planning, Move smart contract development, adversarial security testing (Red Team), on-chain contract analysis (Decompile), frontend integration, comprehensive testing with coverage analysis, agent wallet operations, multi-network deployment, and ecosystem integrations (Kiosk, zkLogin, DeepBook, Walrus, SuiNS, etc.).
